snippet.title: Ahead of vote, Syria's Assad visits seized village
snippet.description: Syria's embattled president marked Easter with a tour Sunday of an ancient Christian village recently recaptured by his forces, an important symbolic prize for his government ahead of coming presidential elections he appears poised to contest.

snippet.title: 4 French journalists home after long Syrian ordeal
snippet.description: Four French journalists kidnapped and held for 10 months in Syria returned home Sunday to joyful families, a presidential welcome and questions about how France managed to obtain their freedom from Islamic extremists.

snippet.title: 4 French journalists abducted in Syria freed, safe
snippet.description: Ten months after their capture in Syria, four French journalists crossed the border into neighboring Turkey and reached freedom Saturday, though dozens more remain held in the country's chaotic civil war.

snippet.title: Editorial Roundup: Excerpts from recent editorials
snippet.description: Excerpts from recent editorials in newspapers in the United States and abroad:

snippet.title: What Happened in Mali?
snippet.description: Previously hailed as an exemplary democracy, then followed by a coup, Mali has fallen out of the media spotlight, but new research finds optimism and confidence among ordinary Malians.

snippet.title: Tunisia takes on militants, pushes back against Shariah law
snippet.description: Islamist militants across North Africa have been fighting governments in Egypt, Libya, Algeria and Mali for not imposing harsh Shariah law.

snippet.title: What the search for Flight MH370 tells us about national security in Asia
snippet.description: What began as a search for a plane has become a window into the limited capacity of the governments in the region to monitor and control their territory.

snippet.title: For real 'Monument Woman,' saving Afghan treasures is unglamorous but richly rewarding
snippet.description: Laura Tedesco's work illustrates the modern saga that accompanies preserving Afghanistan's cultural heritage amid

snippet.title: Obama and Hollande stress common ground at start of French president's state visit
snippet.description: On the first day of the French president's state visit, the leaders tour Thomas Jefferson's Monticello.

snippet.title: Transcript: Senate Intelligence hearing on national security threats
snippet.description: Read the assessments of Director of National Intelligence James Clapper and others.
